goal: Remove Aether developing Aether self-reference while preserving findings
learnings_preserved: Claude Code global sync works by copying commands from .claude/commands/ to ~/.claude/commands/
Hash comparison prevents unnecessary file writes
Namespace isolation via 'ant:' prefix prevents collisions
CLI sync verification catches content drift using SHA-1 checksums

decisions.decision: Keep oracle.sh and oracle.md as infrastructure
decisions.rationale: They are research tools that work on any project
Preserve findings even if source files are removed

decisions.decision: Move QUEEN.md and RECOVERY-PLAN.md to docs/
decisions.rationale: These are valuable documentation, not state

bugs_found: BUG-005: Missing lock release in flag-auto-resolve (HIGH)
BUG-011: Missing error handling in flag-auto-resolve jq (HIGH)
BUG-002: Missing release_lock in flag-add error path
BUG-003: Race condition in backup creation
BUG-004: Missing error code in flag-acknowledge
BUG-006: No lock release on JSON validation failure
BUG-007: 17+ instances of missing error codes
BUG-008: Missing error code in flag-add jq failure
BUG-009: Missing error codes in file checks
BUG-010: Missing error codes in context-update
BUG-012: Missing error code in unknown command

feedback: System now works cleanly on other projects

archive_reason: Phase 0 cleanup complete - self-referential state archived after extraction
